title: Snowflake Cortex AI for Call Center Transcript Analysis
description: Explore how to leverage Snowflake Cortex for large language model (LLM) capabilities directly within Snowflake.

title: Building a dbt Project on Snowflake
description: Understand how to transform data in Snowflake using dbt. This lab guides you through setting up and running your first dbt models.

title: Streamlit Applications with Snowflake
description: Create interactive data applications using Streamlit and connect to Snowflake. Explore how to build and deploy simple dashboards.

title: Machine Learning with Snowpark
description: Explore building and deploying machine learning models directly in Snowflake with Snowpark. A deep dive into in-database ML.

title: Introduction to Data Governance in Snowflake
description: Learn about data governance features like masking policies and row access policies to secure your data in Snowflake.

title: Connecting Power BI to Snowflake
description: Integrate Snowflake with Power BI for powerful data visualization and reporting. Learn to connect and build dashboards.

title: Advanced SQL Techniques in Snowflake
description: Master advanced SQL functions and concepts, including window functions and CTEs, for complex data analysis.

title: Secure Data Sharing with Snowflake
description: Understand how to securely share data with consumers using Snowflake's native data sharing capabilities.

title: Data Pipelines with dbt and Snowflake
description: Build automated data pipelines in Snowflake using dbt for efficient data processing.

title: Power BI with Advanced Reporting
description: Dive into advanced features of Power BI to create insightful and interactive reports from Snowflake data.

title: Using External Functions in Snowflake
description: Extend Snowflake's capabilities by calling external services from your SQL queries using external functions.

title: Optimizing dbt Models for Performance
description: Learn techniques and best practices to optimize your dbt models and ensure efficient data transformation.
